reviewText: Very informative and frightening! It is another reason to believe that large companies do not care about the well being of their neighbors. It is also disappointing to see that you cannot trust politicians to keep them honest.
Could not have said it any better.  Just wish politicians would put aside their greed and do what is best for all Americans instead of the few.

A wonderful entertaining film that exposes toxic problems that plague America. This film takes an eye opening and disturbing look at toxic dangers lurking in our towns and back yards.  You don't want to miss this film. It might just save your family!
